author: achapman
title: Pedro: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte admits ex-Barcelona star’s form is giving him a Stamford Bridge selection headache
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ANTONIO CONTE admits Pedro is giving him a selection headache after showing his best form since playing for Barcelona. 
The Chelsea winger, 29, struggled to make an impression in the Prem last season but has seven goals in his last 12 starts. Getty Images 5 Pedro’s fine form this season is giving Chelsea boss Antonio Conte a selection headache 
And Blues boss Conte said: “All of us can see his performances — he’s playing in a fantastic way. Not only is he scoring, but he’s playing really good football with the ball and without the ball. Keep up to date with ALL the Chelsea news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
“He is always in the right position to press and win the ball, and to score goals. We are seeing the best of Pedro. 
“He played this type of football when he was at Barcelona. I hope he continues in this way, continues to train well and improve. He is a really important player for us.” EPA The versatile forward has benefited from the change to a 3-4-3 formation Sunday Premier League match preview featuring Chelsea v Hull Reuters 5 Antonio Conte is enjoying having so many top attackers at his disposal 
Spaniard Pedro has been part of an attack with Diego Costa and Eden Hazard , with Willian pushing for a starting place up front. 
Conte added: “I think that now we have four players who are playing very well, playing in a fantastic way. 
“I’m pleased as this allows me to make different choices game by game. In this situation it’s not simple for me to choose which decision to make. But to have these four players in great form is really important for me. “It is important for the team and means during the game I can change one player with another and have another different situation to win the game. 
“But it is not simple. And if I make a decision to choose one player and not another, it’s not because I want to punish one player. 
“It is because now I have four players who are in really good form. For me it’s not easy to make the best decision — but I hope to make the best decision.”
